pages.text: ke’a‘irabochi wede hwala lek’eruti belachewi፡- «yebiritu ch’ikane balebeti wede honu hizibochi (wigiya) wede fiti tit’it’eralachihu፡፡ tigadelwachewalachihu፤ weyimi yiselimalu፡፡ bititazezumi alahi melikami minidani yiset’achihwali፡፡ ke’ahuni befiti inide sheshachihu bitisheshumi asamamini k’it’ati yik’et’achihwali፡፡»

be‘iwiri layi (kezemecha bemek’itu) hat’i’ati yelebetimi፡፡ be’anikasami layi hat’i’ati yelebetimi፡፡ bebeshitenyami layi hat’i’ati yelebetimi፡፡ alahinina melikitenyawinimi yemitazezi sewi kesirochachewi wenizochi yemifesubachewini genetochi yagebawali፡፡ yemisheshewinimi sewi asamamiwini k’it’ati yik’et’awali፡፡

kemi’iminanochu bezafitu siri k’ali kidani bemigabuhi gize alahi be’irigit’i wedede፡፡ belibochachewimi wisit’i yalewini ‘awek’e፡፡ be’inerisumi layi irigatani awerede፡፡ k’iribi yehonenimi mekifeti menedachewi፡፡
bizuwochi zerefawochinimi yemiwesidwachewi yehonuni (menedachewi)፡፡ alahimi ashenafi t’ibebenya newi፡፡

alahi bizuwochini zerefawochi yemitiwesidwachewi yehonuni tesifa aderegelachihu፡፡ yihichinimi le’inanite asichekolelachihu፡፡ ke’inanitemi yesewochini ijochi kelekelelachihu፡፡ (litameseginutina) lemi’iminanimi milikiti iniditihoni k’et’itenyawini menigedi yimerachihumi zenidi (yihinini seralachihu)፡፡
lelayitunimi be’iriswa layi gena yalichalachihwatini alahi yawek’atini (le’inanite azegajati)፡፡ alahimi benegeru hulu layi chayi newi፡፡
ineziyami yekaduti (yemeka sewochi behudeyibiya) beteweguwechihu noro ( leshishiti) jeribawochini bazoru neberi፡፡ keziyami zemedimi redatimi ayagenyumi፡፡
alahi yachini kezihi befiti be’irigit’i yalefechiwini limadi denegege፡፡ le’alahimi limadi lewit’ini atagenyimi፡፡
